analysis.description:
MatchingMarket._buys (/unique_chucks/1/0xb7ac09c2c0217b07d7c103029b4918a2c401eecb.sol#985-1001) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == offers[id].pay_amt && isOfferSorted(id)

MatchingMarket._buys (/unique_chucks/1/0xb7ac09c2c0217b07d7c103029b4918a2c401eecb.sol#985-1001) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == offers[id].pay_amt && isOfferSorted(id)
MatchingMarket._matcho (/unique_chucks/1/0xb7ac09c2c0217b07d7c103029b4918a2c401eecb.sol#1067-1129) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- t_pay_amt == 0 || t_buy_amt == 0
	- t_pay_amt == 0 || t_buy_amt == 0

MatchingMarket._buys (/unique_chucks/1/0xb7ac09c2c0217b07d7c103029b4918a2c401eecb.sol#985-1001) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == offers[id].pay_amt && isOfferSorted(id)
MatchingMarket._matcho (/unique_chucks/1/0xb7ac09c2c0217b07d7c103029b4918a2c401eecb.sol#1067-1129) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- t_pay_amt == 0 || t_buy_amt == 0
	- t_pay_amt == 0 || t_buy_amt == 0
SimpleMarket.buy (/unique_chucks/1/0xb7ac09c2c0217b07d7c103029b4918a2c401eecb.sol#373-419) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(uint128(spend) == spend)
	- quantity == 0 || spend == 0 || quantity > offer.pay_amt || spend > offer.buy_amt
	- offers[id].pay_amt == 0

elements.expression: quantity == 0 || spend == 0 || quantity > offer.pay_amt || spend > offer.buy_amt
